controller

Class PatternEditorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.stage.Window
      • javafx.stage.Stage
        • controller.PatternEditorController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class PatternEditorController
extends javafx.stage.Stage
    This is the stage and controller class for the editor/saver window. This dialog window lets the user edit the pattern, view the following generations and save the pattern to .rle or create a GIF with AnimationExportController. It handles the rendering of a GameBoard with the private class BoardRenderer, the simulation with the private class Simulator and editing with BoardEditor.
